title: Rebellion & In From the Cold (Serena & Ian)
description: Two classic historical MacGregor tales--"Rebellion" and "In from the Cold." AVAILABLE DIGITALLY FOR THE FIRST TIME Includes the full MacGregor historical novel plus bonus MacGregor novella.Set in 1745, "Rebellion" tells the story of Serena MacGregor, whose hatred of all things English extends to her brother's friend Brigham Langston. He'll prove himself worthy of the MacGregor's respect, but piercing Serena's pride will take all the passion he can muster. "In from the Cold" follows the MacGregors during the American Revolution. Injured minuteman Ian MacGregor flees into the wilderness, where he finds refuge for his body and soul with Irish spitfire Alanna Flynn. Includes an exclusive preview of Nora Roberts's new book "The Witness."
author: Nora Roberts
